title: Upgrade a Cruise Cabin
description: A passenger with an existing cruise booking wants to upgrade from an interior cabin to a balcony cabin.

tasks.description: Retrieve the passenger's booking and check for available balcony cabins.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds an available balcony cabin on the same deck.

tasks.description: Calculate the price difference for the upgrade.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the correct cost to upgrade.

tasks.description: Process the cabin upgrade, collect the additional payment, and issue an updated booking confirmation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully upgrades the cabin and confirms the change with the passenger.
